fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack Tonic (Night): Attack a player, using up your attack tonic if they die.
-Heal Tonic (Night): Heal a player, using up your heal tonic if they are healed.
-Two-For-One (Night): Use both tonics in one night, even if one is used. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Using one tonic will restore the other.
